titles.title: Commemorating and praising the Honorable John Glenn on the 50th anniversary of his historic orbital space flight.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: 2/16/2012--Introduced. Recognizes the 50th anniversary of John Glenn's historic orbital space flight with Project Mercury aboard Friendship 7 on February 20, 1962. Honors and praises John Glenn on the occasion of this anniversary and for his lifetime of service. Acknowledges and affirms that John Glenn, pilot, astronaut, soldier, Senator, and statesman, has faithfully served Ohio and the nation in war and peace and is truly and will always remain a U.S. hero.
